thread.title: FRIDAY’S TOP PERFORMERS

title: FRIDAY’S TOP PERFORMERS
text:
Posted: October 24, 2015 at 2:02 a.m. BEN GOFF • @NWABENGOFF Credit: NWA Democrat-Gazette Kasey Ford, Bentonville quarterback, looks for a receiver in the first quarter on Friday Oct. 23, 2015 during the game against Rogers in Whitey Smith Stadium in Rogers.
